'''Smooth quartz stairs''' are a [[smooth quartz]] variant of [[stairs]].

== Obtaining ==
=== Breaking ===
Smooth quartz stairs can be mined using any [[pickaxe]]. If mined without a pickaxe, they drop nothing.
